      • findRegion

        public Region findRegion(Factor ptl,
                boolean doCreate)
        Returns the region in this graph whose factor list contains only a given potential.
        Parameters:
        ptl -
        doCreate - If true, an appropriate region will be created and added to graph if none is found.
        Returns:
        A region, or null if no region found and doCreate false.

      • findRegion

        public Region findRegion(Variable var,
                boolean doCreate)
        Returns the region in this graph whose variable list contains only a given variable.
        Parameters:
        var -
        doCreate - If true, an appropriate region will be created and added to graph if none is found.
        Returns:
        A region, or null if no region found and doCreate false.

      • findContainingRegion

        public Region findContainingRegion(Variable variable)
        Finds the smallest region containing a given variable. This might return a region that contains many extraneous variables.
        Parameters:
        variable -
        Returns:

      • findContainingRegion

        public Region findContainingRegion(VarSet varSet)
        Finds the smallest region containing all the variables in a given set. This might return a region that contains many extraneous variables.
        Parameters:
        varSet -
        Returns:
